text: Pokrovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Pereborskoye Rural Settlement, Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 163 as of 2010. There are 6 streets. == Geography == It is located on the Shakva River. == References == Category:Rural localities in Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai
title: Pokrovka, Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai
